channel.title: Go on echo
channel.description: Recent content in Go on echo

item.title: getting started with echo framework in go
item.description: table of contents what is echo? installation creating your first api handling parameters markdown-style pictures tables conclusion what is echo? echo is a fast and minimalist web framework for go. it’s designed for building robust and scalable web applications and apis with minimal boilerplate code. installation to get started, you need to install the echo framework. open your terminal and run: go get -u github.com/labstack/echo/v4 creating your first api let’s create a simple api endpoint using echo.
